title: Timpson's country churches
brief_description: Join John Timpson as he traipses across the country in search of churches and the oddities, curiosities and tales they harbour. John visits over twenty churches, reflecting on them with amusement and affection and an interest in the people who maintain country churches, thus perpetuating the position of churches in village life.
